sentences.en: Applying the dye can be messy, particularly on long hair.
sentences.cn: 涂抹染发剂可能会搞得一团糟，特别是长发。

sentences.en: As the work tends to be a bit messy you'll need to wear old clothes.
sentences.cn: 这个活儿有点脏，你需要穿旧衣服。

sentences.en: Dad cooks when Mum is busy, he makes me clean up my messy room.
sentences.cn: 妈妈忙的时候爸爸做饭，他还让我清理我乱糟糟的房间。

sentences.en: Don't worry if this first coat of paint looks messy.
sentences.cn: 如果这第一层油漆看上去有点脏的话，不用担心。

sentences.en: Finger painting is very messy but an excellent diversion.
sentences.cn: 用手指画画是很脏，但却是一项极好的消遣。

sentences.en: I can't find anything on this messy desk.
sentences.cn: 在这张堆放得乱七八糟的桌子上我什么也找不到.

sentences.en: It is a major operation . It is a very messy operation.
It's a messy business having a tooth taken out.
John had been through a messy divorce himself.
sentences.cn: 约翰自己也经历过一次十分棘手的离婚。

sentences.en: Life is a messy and tangled business.
sentences.cn: 生活就是一件既混乱又复杂的事情。

sentences.en: She found herself in a messy spot.
sentences.cn: 她发现自己陷入了窘境.

sentences.en: She was a good, if messy, cook.
sentences.cn: 尽管不爱干净，她还是个好厨子。

sentences.en: Sorry the place is so messy, I haven’t had time to clear up.
sentences.cn: 对不起，这地方又脏又乱，我一直没时间打扫。

sentences.en: The bed now was just messy.
The messy garden is in a state of neglect.
sentences.cn: 这个又脏又乱的花园处于无人管理的状态.

sentences.en: Working underneath the car is always a messy job.
sentences.cn: 在汽车底下工作是件脏活.

words.tran_cn: 混乱；食堂，伙食团；困境；脏乱的东西
把事情弄糟；制造脏乱；玩弄
凌乱的，散乱的；肮脏的，污秽的；麻烦的

trans.tran_cn: 凌乱的，散乱的，肮脏的，污秽的，复杂的，麻烦的，难以应付的
